thread.title: Priyanka Chopra: Box Office clash of 'Dilwale', 'Bajirao Mastani' unfortunate
thread.title_full: Priyanka Chopra: Box Office clash of 'Dilwale', 'Bajirao Mastani' unfortunate - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Priyanka Chopra: Box Office clash of 'Dilwale', 'Bajirao Mastani' unfortunate
text:
Actress Priyanka Chopra feels it is unfortunate that there is a clash between her upcoming film Bajirao Mastani and superstar Shah Rukh Khan's Dilwale .
READ: Priyanka Chopra called Kareena to join Girl Rising campaign
Sanjay Leela Bhansali's Bajirao Mastani , a love saga, features Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh and Priyanka in lead roles.
For latest Bollywood updates, follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Bollywood news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
While Dilwale is a comedy-action film, directed by Rohit Shetty. It stars Shah Rukh, Kajol, Varun Dhawan and Kriti Sanon. Dilwale and Bajirao Mastani are scheduled for release on December 18.
For more interesting Bollywood news and pictures, follow us on Pinterest>>> timesofindia
For latest Bollywood updates, follow us on G+ >>> The Times of India Entertainment
"Both the films will do well as both are different from each other. It is unfortunate that both the films are coming together. I am hopeful that both will do well. I wish luck to the team of Dilwale ," Priyanka told PTI. The promotions of Bajirao Mastani kickstarted in Pune last month. 'Gajanan' aarti song from the film was launched in Pune, at the Shree Chhatrapati Shivaji Sports Complex, Balewadi Stadium.
"I am little upset the promotions have started and I couldn't be there. But I too would be promoting the film. There will be international promotions as well which I would be part of. I am busy shooting for 'Quantico' and then I come back for Bajirao Mastani ," Priyanka said. Her debut American show premiered in India on October 3 on Star World.
